rules_text:
Ward–Pay 7 life.
Reap–{3}{B}{B}: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. [i](Activate this ability only once each turn and only as a sorcery. It costs {0} if a creature you controlled died this turn.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“It will attempt to bend you to its will. That's why you must strike first.”
—The Great Witch[/i]
